attributes.description:

Mileage: 100000km
2016 Mercedes-Benz Vito 111 1.6 CDi Tourer Pro for sale. This car comes with Full Service History, books and spare key. 
Don't miss this awesome people carrier in diesel and very light on fuel.
Car is also fitted standard with Airbags, Bluetooth, Aircon, Electric Mirrors, LED Daytime Lights and loads of space.

Trade-Ins are Welcome.
Finance can be arranged with all major banks with a additional administrative fee. Warranty options are available.

Mercedes-Benz Vito 111 1.6 TDi manual
Power - 84 kW @ 3800 rpm
Torque - 279 Nm @ 1500 rpm
Economy - 6.2 l/100km
Emissions - 163 g/km
Emissions Rating - X
Gears - 6 / Rear
Airbags (total) - 4
Length - 5,008 cm
Seats - 8
Fuel Tank Capacity - 75 litres
Service Intervals - 15,000 km

attributes.description: At Action Ford Roodepoort, 93 William Nicole Drive Constantia, you will always find a good quality pre-owned vehicles. All our vehicles goes through a quality check to make sure that our vehicles are in a good condition. All our vehicles must have a full service history. All our vehicles are Accedent free (No structural damage). Most of our vehicles have standard warranties and if the vehicle is out of warranty, we can provide you with a warranty at a cost to give you peace of mind. We always strive in good customer service.
